analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/14/0x4deacd60e9d704fac4bc45a9157f26889bd2e97b.sol:
	Contract YGC has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0x4deacd60e9d704fac4bc45a9157f26889bd2e97b.sol#205-206)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/14/0x4deacd60e9d704fac4bc45a9157f26889bd2e97b.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
